data.name: Fenix Finance
data.description:
AMM exchange & Yield farming dapp on BSC,
Initial farm offering (new token launch model pioneered by Fenix Finance) , NFTs , lottery & cross chain services(BSC,Erc20,Polygon,Fantom,Avalanche,xDai,Solana)
we have chosen BSC because the instant confirmations, cheap fees, and also because we have strong beliefs in Binance and we think it’s going to be the next evolution in the crypto space.
Because of what has been happening recently on the BSC, we took the following steps to ensure everyone’s safety. Deploy a 24 hour time lock contract.
Any changes made to the smart contract will be delayed by 24 hours.
We will implement this after we have introduced all our pools and we confirm the rewards are working as expected. This is 5x longer than all the other protocols. Any changes to the contracts such as adding a new pool will be communicated to the community.
We have removed the Migrator function from the Masterchef contract, now you won’t have to worry about your funds when farming.
Removing the Migrator function and implementing a Timelock of 24 hours removes entirely the risk of a rug pull as we want FENIX farmers to farm without risks.

stages.comments:
After the Token sales start. For the first two hours only tier club members can buy tokens based on the max purchase amount.
If some tokens remain after those two hours, then all users can buy. These sales are also controlled by the max amount concept, but with a 10% increase in prices. Token sales last at most 48 hours.

If you are a higher Club member, then you can buy more Tokens:

JulPad Club (Tier 1): Max Purchase Amount *1
JulPad Club (Tier 2): Max Purchase Amount *2
JulPad Club (Tier3): Max Purchase Amount *3
JulPad Club (Tier4): Max Purchase Amount *4

There are two possible token sale end scenarios: either your tokens sell out, or don’t. In both cases, the trading pair token/BNB will be created on JulSwap based on your settings. The trading pair gets created 48 hours after the Token Sale start time.

How is the total supply calculated?

Sample: The Project mentions in the token sale that they want to use 10,000 tokens, which is 10% of the total supply, for token sale, 40% for Marketing (including Team, Exchanges and other) & 50% for the Liquidity.
If the token sale is a 100% sold out, then the total supply will be 100,000 tokens.
10% Token Sales = 10,000 Tokens
40% Marketing = 40,000 Tokens
50% Liquidity = 50,000 Tokens

However, if the token sale is only 50% sold out, then the total supply will be 50,000 tokens. This is because the percentages are measured on the token sale result.

Tokens can be claimed by the buyers directly after creating the trading pair.

48 hours after the Token Sale end, 10% of the raised amount gets distributed back to tier club members in JULb who invested into the project (buy back JULb with BNB).

Here’s how tier club members are decided, and the amount of JULb each club will have:

JulPad Club (Tier 1) : 25 JULb — 10%
JulPad Club (Tier 2) : 100 JULb — 25%
JulPad Club (Tier3): 500 JULb — 30%
JulPad Club (Tier4): 2,500 JULb — 35%

If you are wondering how can users join a given club, here’s the answer: locking JULb. The more a user holds JULb, the higher their rank. But if a user unlocks his assets earlier than expected, then, a penalty fee must be paid:

less than 10 Days — 30%
less than 20 Days — 25%
less than 30 Days — 20%
less than 60 Days — 10%
less than 90 Days — 5%
after 90 Days — 0%
